title: Raising You This Small Stuff - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Character Growth   Contracts   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Game Elements   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heartwarming   Level System   Modern Day   Naive Protagonist   Popular Love Interests   Protagonist Falls in Love First   System Administrator   Time Skip   Timid Protagonist   Transmigration   Transported into a Game World   Wealthy Characters
author: 九云歌
description:
After an ‘Elf Rebirth Project’ game was forcefully installed on a movie emperor’s cell phone, he suspected it to be a virus, so he moved to uninstall it!!!! (╰_╯)#

The cute little interstellar prince reborn in the game said softly and waxily: “No… don’t…. I…. I eat very little, don’t uninstall me, ok?” (ó﹏ò?)

The movie emperor who was so hit by his cuteness that he almost vomited blood pretended to be calm: … (￣ＴＴ￣) Bleeding from the nose

Since then, the life of the movie emperor: Buy, buy, buy, buy, buy, buy ~ and raise my little cutie~(≧ω≦).>
